column1: The Pit Room////I had high hopes after the brisket and the sausage. But alas
column2: the pork ribs were just okay. I was expecting some tender
column3: fall off the bone meat. However
column4: the pork ribs that I had were kind of tough to eat. It wasn't tender
column5: it didn't fall of the one
column6: even when I bit into it
column7: I still had to pull it off the bone. They just didn't impress me at all. I'm not sure if it was a fluke or something because both my boss thought that his pork ribs were amazeballs. But then again
column8: he hasn't been to many of the top BBQ joints in Houston.
